description: TypeScript SDK for the Symbiont agent runtime — agent lifecycle, webhook verification, AgentPin identity, memory systems, skill scanning, metrics, scheduling, and MCP protocol integration. Part of the ThirdKey trust stack.
rules: Import from @symbi/core for client, types, and all standalone modules (webhook verification, skill scanning, markdown memory, metrics export)
Use SymbiontClient as the main entry point — sub-clients (agents, agentpin, schedules, channels, workflows, metricsClient, system, secrets, mcp, toolReview, http) are lazy-loaded on first access
Webhook verification: use createProviderVerifier('GITHUB' | 'STRIPE' | 'SLACK' | 'CUSTOM', secret) for known providers; HmacVerifier and JwtVerifier for custom setups
AgentPin credentials use ES256 (ECDSA P-256) exclusively — never accept other algorithms
MarkdownMemoryStore, SkillScanner, SkillLoader, FileMetricsExporter, CompositeExporter, MetricsCollector are standalone modules — import directly, not via client sub-clients
Type definitions with Zod schemas live in @symbi/types — re-exported from @symbi/core for convenience
SkillScanner includes 10 built-in ClawHavoc security rules — always scan untrusted skills before loading
FileMetricsExporter and MarkdownMemoryStore use atomic file writes (tempfile + rename) for data safety
